text: @racheljulie @coffeespoonie @NYGovCuomo This is ridiculous. This is exactly why a group of techies in San Antonio is 3D printing face shields and trying to do the same for ventilators. Please donate and share, our healthcare workers and their patients deserve better. https://t.co/0V0747gls0
